'''Radiant Spincrystal 82''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[On the Barren Sands]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in [[Land of Lower Setekh]].
